change.item:
Initial text, based roughly on Oxyrhynchus Papyri IX
$Log: soph.ich_gk.xml,v $
Revision 1.1  2009-12-08 18:56:09  rsingh04
moved more xml files around based on copyright status

Revision 1.1  2005/07/25 15:03:09  packel
Converted to XML

Revision 1.6  2004/04/21 20:42:00  mimno
added card 1s

Revision 1.5  2003/07/01 22:18:08  yorkc
Updated texts to TEI P4 and Perseus P4 extensions; minor cleanup (esp. character encodings and typos.)

Revision 1.4  2001/03/19 21:29:41  amahoney
mark one supplement as "unclear" to demonstrate the new rule in the spec;
I think this particular one is a true supplement rather than an unclear
letter, but it really doesn't matter a whole lot for this purpose or in this text

Revision 1.3  2001/01/02 14:48:53  amahoney
move credits for editors to filedesc proper so they'll show in pulldown

Revision 1.2  2000/12/29 22:58:38  amahoney
the translation is ready to go

Revision 1.1  2000/12/04 23:16:13  amahoney
new text

sp.speaker: *)Apo/llwn
l: pa=sin qeoi=s kai\ pa=sin a)gge/llw brotoi=s
mo/sxous te kai\ ne/wn no/meuma porti/dwn

l.#text: a)fanw=s te/xnaisin:  w(s  e)gw\ ou)k a)\n w)|o/mhn

l: ou)/t' a)\n qew=n tin' ou)/t' e)fhme/rwn brotw=n
dra=sai to/d' e)/rgon w(=dersqb; pro\s to/lman pesei=n.
tau=t' ou)=n e)pei/per e)/maqon e)kplagei\s o)/knw|

l.#text: qeoi=s brotoi=s te mhde/n' a)gnoei=n ta/de.

l: *Qra|kw=n d' e)ph=lqon fu=la tou= panto\s stratou=
w(s ei)/te poimh\n ei)/t' a)grwsth/rwn tis h)\
qhrw=n ti/s e)sti, pa=sin a)gge/llw ta/de,
to\n fw=ra tw=n *paiw=nos o(/stis a)\n la/bh|,
tw|=d' au)to/xrhma misqo/s e)sq' o( kei/menos.

sp.speaker: *Silhno/s
l: spoudh=| ta/d', h(\ pa/resti presbu/th| maqw/n

l.#text: a)/n pws to\ xrh=ma tou=to/ soi kunhge/sw.

l: to\t' aggelo/s moi kei/menon xruson ste/fe

l.#text: im' a)\n ei)/per e)ktelei=s a(/per le/geis

sp.speaker: *Silhno/s
sp.l: tas bou=s a)pa/cw soi: su\ d' e)mpe/dou do/sin.

sp.speaker: *)Apo/llwn
sp.l: e(/cei sf' o( g' eu(rw\n o(/stis e)/sq': e(toi=ma de/.

l.#text: e)leu/qeros su\ pa=n te ge/nos e)/stai te/knwn.

sp.speaker: *Silhno/s

l.#text: tuxei=n me pra/gous ou(= dra/mhm' e)pei/getai,

l: tw=n ei)/ tis o)pth/r e)stin h)\ kath/koos,
e)moi/ t' a)\n ei)/h prosfilh\s fra/sas to/de

l.#text: qeo\s qeo\s qeo\s qeo/s: e)/a e)/a:

sp.speaker: *(Hmix. B
sp.l: tau=t' e)/st' e)kei=na: tw=n bow=n ta\ sh/mata.

sp.speaker: *(Hmix. A
sp.l: si/ga: qeo/s tis th\n a)poiki/an a)/gei.

sp.speaker: *(Hmix. B
sp.l: ti/ drw=men, w)= ta=n; h)= to\ de/on e)ch/nomen;

sp.speaker: *(Hmix. B
l: safh= ga\r au)/q' e(/kasta shmai/nei ta/de.

sp.speaker: *(Hmix. A
l: kai\ tou)pi/shmon au)to\ tw=n o(plw=n pa/lin.

sp.speaker: *(Hmix. A
l: r(oi/bdhm' e)a/n ti tw=n bow=n di' ou)=s la/bh|

sp.speaker: *(Hmix. B
l: ou)k ei)sakou/w pw torw=s tou= fqe/gmatos.

l.#text: a)ll' au)ta\ mh\n i)/xnh te xw) sti/bos ta/de

l: kei/nwn e)nargh= tw=n bow=n maqei=n pa/ra.

sp.speaker: *(Hmix. A
l: palinstrafh= toi nai\ ma\ *Di/a ta\ bh/mata
ei)s tou)/mpalin de/dorken au): ta/d' ei)/side.

l.#text: ti/ e)sti\ touti/; ti/s o( tro/xos tou= ta/gmatos;

l: ei)s tou)pi/sw ta\ pro/sqen h)/llaktai, ta\ d' au)=

sp.speaker: *Silhno/s
l: ti/n' au)= te/xnhn su\ th/nd' a)/r' e)ch=ures, ti/n' au)=,
pro\s gh=|; ti/s u(mw=n o( tro/pos; ou)xi\ manqa/nw:
e)xi=nos w(/s tis e)n lo/xmh| kei=sai pesw/n,
h)/ tis pi/qhkos ku/bda qumai/neis tini/.
ti/ tau=ta; pou= gh=s e)ma/qet' e)n poi/w| to/pw|;

l.#text: shmh/nat', ou) ga\r i)/dris ei)mi\ tou= tro/pou.

sp.speaker: *Silhno/s
l: ti/ tou=t' i)u/zeis; ti/na fobh=|; ti/n' ei)sora=|s;
ti/ dei=m' o)/pwpas; ti/ pote bakxeu/eis e)/xwn;
agxou= tis h)/xei ke/rxnos:  i(mei/reis maqei=n

l.#text: ti/s h)=n;  ti/ siga=t', w)= pro\ tou= lali/statoi;

sp.speaker: *Xoro/s
sp.l: si/ga me\n ou)=n.

sp.speaker: *Silhno/s
sp.l: ti/n' e)/st' e)kei=qen a(ponosfi/zeis e)/xwn;

sp.speaker: *Silhno/s
sp.l: kalw=s a)kou/sw mhdeno\s fwnh\n klu/wn;

sp.speaker: *Silhno/s
sp.l: e)mo\n di/wgma/ g' ou)damw=s o)nh/sete.

sp.speaker: *Xoro/s
l: a)/kouson au)= tou= xrh/matos xro/non tina/,

l.#text: yo/fw|, to\n ou)dei\s pw/pot' h)/kousen brotw=n.

sp.speaker: *Silhno/s

l.#text: ti/ moi yo/fon; fobei=sqe kai\ deimai/nete,

l: ka/kista qhrw=n o)ntes, e)n pa/sh| skia=|
kai\ glw=ssa kai\ fa/lhtes. ei) de/ pou de/h|,
ou(= po/ll' e)f' h(/bhs mnh/mat' a)ndrei/as u(/po
ou)k ei)s fugh\n kli/nontos, ou) douloume/nou,
a(\ nu=n u(f' u(mw=n la/mpr' u(porrupai/netai
o(\n dh\ fobei=sqe pai=des w(\s pri\n ei)sidei=n,

l.#text: u(mi=n te ka)moi/: tau=t' a)fe/ntes eu(/dete.

l: ta\s bou=s o(/ph| beba=si kai\ to\n bouko/lon,

sp.speaker: *Xoro/s

l.#text: i(/n' eu)= katei/dh|s ei)/ ti/s e)sti deili/a:

l: gnw/shi ga\r au)to/s, a)\n parh=|s, ou)de\n le/gwn.

sp.speaker: *Silhno/s
l: e)gw\ parw\n au)to/s se prosbibw= lo/gw|,
a)ll' ei(=' e)fi/stw trizu/ghs oi(/mou ba/sin:

l.#text: e)gw\ d' e)n e)/rgois parme/nwn s' a)peuqunw=.

sp.speaker: *Xoro/s
l: u(= u(= u(=, y y, a)= a)=. le/g' o(/ ti ponei=s.
pa/ter, ti/ siga=|s; mw=n a)lhqe\s ei)/pomen;

sp.speaker: *Xoro/s
l: ou)k e)/stin. a)ll' au)to\s su\ tau=q' o(/ph| qe/leis
zh/tei te ka)ci/xneue kai\ plou/tei labw\n

l.#text: ta\s bou=s te kai\ to\n xruso\n    e

sp.speaker: *Silhno/s

l.#text: a)ll' ou)/ ti mh/ soi/ m' e)klipei=n e)fh/somai

l: ou)d' e)cupelqei=n tou= po/nou pri/n g' a)\n safw=s
ei)dw=men o(/ntin' e)/ndon h(/d' e)/xei ste/gh.

sp.speaker: *Xoro/s
l: o( d' ou) fanei=tai toi=sin. a)ll' e)gw\ ta/xa

l.#text: w(/st' ei)sakou=sai kei) li/an kwfo/s tis h)=|.

sp.speaker: *Kullh/nh
l: qh=res, ti/ to/nde xloero\n u(lw/dh pa/gon
ti/s h(/de te/xnh; ti/s meta/stasis po/nwn,
ou(\s pro/sqen ei)=xes despo/th| xa/rin fe/rwn,
dora=| xeroi=n te qu/rson eu)palh= fe/rwn
su\n e)ggo/nois nu/mfaisi kai\ p<ai/>dwn o)/xlw|;
nu=n d' a)gnow= to\ xrh=ma: poi= strofai\ ne/wn

l.#text: o(mou= d' a)\n au)=tis  ai fwr

l: kai\ tau=t' a)fei=sa su\n podw=n lakti/smasi

l.#text: kai\ tau=t' a)\n a)/llws h)\ klm
nos ti/ nu/mfhn e)/ti poe=it' a)naiti/an;

sp.speaker: *Xoro/s
l: tou=d', ou)/te ga\r nei=kos h(/kei se/ toi

l.#text: da/|ou ma/xas ou)d' a)ceno/s pou se/qen

l: glw=ssan ma/taio/s t' a)f' h(mw=n qi/goi.
a)ll' eu)petw=s moi pro/fanon to\ pra=g-
m', e)n to/pois toi=sde ti/s ne/rqe ga=s w(=d' a)ga-

sp.speaker: *Kullh/nh
l: tau=t' e)/st' e)kei/nwn nu=n  tro/pwn pepai/tera,
kai\ toi=sde qhrw=n e)kpu/qoio ma=llon a)\n
nu/mfhs: e)moi\ ga\r ou)k a)resto/n e)st' e)/rin
a)ll' h(/suxos pro/faine kai\ mh/nue/ moi

sp.speaker: *Xoro/s
l: o(/tou me\n ou(/nek' h)=lqon, u(/steron fra/sw:

l.#text: to\ fqe/gma d' h(mi=n tou=q' o(/per fwnei= fra/son

l: kai\ ti/s pot' au)tw=| diaxara/ssetai brotw=n.

sp.speaker: *Kullh/nh
l: u(ma=s me\n au)tou\s xrh\ ta/d' ei)de/nai safw=s
w(s ei) fanei=te to\n lo/gon to\n e)c e)mou=,

l.#text: kai\ ga\r ke/kruptai tou)=rgon e)n qew=n e(/drais,

l: kata\ spe/os de\ pai=d' e)fi/tusen mo/non:
tou=ton de\ xersi\ tai=s e)mai=s e)gw\ tre/fw:
mhtro\s ga\r i)sxu\s e)n no/sw| xeima/zetai:
o( d' au)/cetai kat' h)=mar ou)k e)peiko/ta
me/gistos, w(/ste qau=ma kai\ fo/bos m' e)/xei.

l.#text: gui/ois e)rei/dei paido\s ei)s h(/bhs a)kmh/n,

l: duseu/reto/s t' e)/t' e)sti tou= patro\s qe/sei.
a)fanei= d' o(\ peu/qh|  fqe/gma mhxanh=| bre/mon

l.#text: kai\ po/ll' e)qa/mbeis au)to\s, h(me/ra| mia|
e)/mmeston aggos eu(=re kai\ ka/tw donei=.

sp.speaker: *Kullh/nh
sp.l: mh\ nu=n a)pi/stei: pista\ ga/r se prosgela=| qea=s e)/ph.

l.#text: kai\ pw=s pi/qwmai tou= qano/ntos fqe/gma toiou=ton bre/mein;

sp.speaker: *Kullh/nh
sp.l: piqou=: qanw\n ga\r e)/sxe fwnh/n, zw=n d' a)/naudos h)=n o( qh/r.

sp.speaker: *Xoro/s
sp.l: poi=o/s tis h)=n ei)=dos; promh/khs, h)\ 'pi/kurtos, h)\ braxu/s;

sp.speaker: *Kullh/nh
sp.l: braxu/s, xutrw/dhs, poiki/lh| dora=| katerriknwme/nos.

sp.speaker: *Xoro/s
sp.l: w(s ai)e/louros ei)ka/sai pe/fuken h)\ tw\s po/rdalis;

l.#text: plei=ston metacu/: goggu/lon ga/r e)sti kai\ braxuskele/s.

sp.speaker: *Xoro/s
sp.l: ou)d' w(s i)xneum<wn> prosfere\s pe/fuken ou)d' w(s karki/n<os>;

sp.speaker: *Kullh/nh
sp.l: ou)d' au)= toiou=to/n e)stin: a)ll' a)/llon tin' e)ceurou= tro/pon.

sp.speaker: *Xoro/s
sp.l: a)ll' w(s kera/sths ka/nqaros dh=t' e)sti\n *ai)tnai=os fuh/n;

sp.speaker: *Kullh/nh
sp.l: nu=n e)ggu\s e)/gnws w(=| ma/lista prosfere\s to\ knw/dalon.

l.#text: ti/ d' au)= to\  fwnou=n e)stin au)tou=, tou)nto\s h)\ tou)/cw, fra/son.

sp.speaker: *Xoro/s
sp.l: poi=on de\ tou)/nom' e)nne/peis;  po/rsunon, ei)/ ti ple/on e)/xeis.

sp.speaker: *Kullh/nh
sp.l: to\n qh=ra me\n xe/lun, to\ fwnou=n d' au)= lu/ran o( pai=s kalei=.

sp.speaker: *Kullh/nh

l.#text: kai\ tou=to lu/phs e)/st' a)/kestron kai\ parayukth/rion

l: kei/nw| mo/non, xai/rei d' a)lu/wn kai/ ti prosfwnw=n me/los
cu/mfwnon: e)cai/rei ga\r au)to\n ai)o/lisma th=s lu/ras.

l.#text: ou(/tws o( pai=s qano/nti qhri\ fqe/gm' e)mhxanh/sato.

sp.speaker: *Xoro/s

l.#text: prepta\ <d' au)=> dia\ to/nou fa/smat' e)/g-

l: to\ pra=gma d' ou(=per poreu/w ba/dhn,
i)/sqi to\n dai/mon', o(/stis poq' o(\s
tau=t' e)texnh/sat', ou)k a)/llos e)sti\n klopeu\s
su\ d' a)nti\ tw=nde mh\ xale-

sp.speaker: *Kullh/nh
sp.l: ti/s e)/xei pla/nh se; ti/na kloph\n w)nei/disas;

sp.speaker: *Xoro/s
sp.l: ou) ma\ *Di/a s', w)= pre/sbeira xeima/zein  qe/lw.

l.#text: mw=n to\n *Dio\s pai=d' o)/nta f<h>lh/thn kalei=s;

sp.speaker: Kullh/nh

l.#text: su\ d' ou=)n to\ loip\on ei)s e)/m' eu)di/an e)/xwn,

l: ei)/ soi fe/rei xa/rm' h)/ ti kerdai/nein dokei=s
o)/pws qe/leis ka/xaze kai\ te/rpou fre/na:
to\n pai=da d' o)/nta tou= *dio\s safei= lo/gw|
mh\ skw=pte poiw=n e)n ne/w| ne/on lo/gon:

l.#text: ou(=tos ga\r ou)/te pro\s patro\s kle/pths e)/fu

l: ou)/t' au)=tis e)n mh/trwsin h( kloph\ kratei=.
ei) dh\ kloph/ ti/s e)sti, to\n kle/pthn sko/pei
a)/poron a)/karpon:  tou=de d' ou) p<ei>n<h|=> do/mos.

l.#text: pro\s o(/ntin' h(/kei: tw=|de d' ou)x ou(/tw pre/pei.

l: a)ll' ai)e\n ei)= su\ pai=s: ne/os ga\r w)\n a)nh\r
pw/gwni qa/llwn w(s tra/gos knh/kw| xlida=|s.
pau/ou to\ lei=on falakro\n h(donh=| pitna/s.
ou)k e)k qew=n ta\ mw=ra kai\ ge/loia xrh\

sp.speaker: *Xoro/s
l: yhkton: ou) ga/r me tau=ta pei/seis,

l.#text: mh/ me ta=sd' e)c o(dou= bi/baze.

sp.speaker: *Xoro/s
sp.l: o( *Zeu\s ga\r

sp.speaker: *Xoro/s
sp.l: ei) toi ponhra\ dra=|, ponhro\s w)\n kurei=.

sp.speaker: *Kullh/nh
sp.l: kakw=s a)kou/ein ou) pre/pei *Dio\s go/nw|.

sp.speaker: *Xoro/s
sp.l: ei) d' e)/st' a)lhqh=, xrh/ me kai\ le/gein ta/de.

note.#text: about 8 lines of which we have only the initial letters

sp.speaker: *Kullh/nh
sp.l: pou= kai\ bo/es ne/mousi t

sp.speaker: *Xoro/s
sp.l: plei/ous de/ g' h)/dh nu=n

sp.speaker: *Kullh/nh
sp.l: ti/s, w)= po/nhr', e)/xei; ti/ ple

sp.speaker: *Xoro/s
sp.l: o( pai=s o(\s e)/ndon e)sti\n e)gkeklhime/nos.

sp.speaker: *Kullh/nh
sp.l: to\n pai=da pau=sai tou= *dio\s  kakw=s le/gwn.

l.#text: pau/oim' a)/n , ei) ta\s bou=s tis e)cela=n qe/loi.

sp.speaker: *Kullh/nh
sp.l: h)/dh me pni/geis kai\ su\ xai) bo/es se/qen.

note.#text: one whole column is missing, perhaps more

sp.speaker: *Silhno/s
sp.l: to\n e)g
